survey_name: Employee Experience with Workplace AI Assistants Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees on their experience with AI-powered workplace assistants, focusing on usability, productivity impact, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with the AI-powered workplace assistant currently available in your organization?
answer_options: Not very familiar, rarely use it
Not familiar at all, never used it
questions.client_notes: This question helps gauge overall familiarity. Use a balanced 4-point scale for clarity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons. Display all options vertically.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with the AI-powered workplace assistant currently available in your organization?
answer_options: Not very familiar, rarely use it
Not familiar at all, never used it

questions.question_text: Which of the following tasks do you use the AI assistant for? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Skip if Q1 = 'Not familiar at all, never used it'
questions.client_notes: Multi-select question to understand primary use cases. Include 'None of the above' option for completeness.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes. Allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following tasks do you use the AI assistant for? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Skip if Q1 = 'Not familiar at all, never used it'

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how would you rate the AI assistant's ability to understand and respond accurately to your requests?
questions.routing_logic: Skip if Q1 = 'Not familiar at all, never used it'
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale for nuanced feedback. Label each point for clarity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons presented horizontally if space allows.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how would you rate the AI assistant's ability to understand and respond accurately to your requests?
script.routing_logic: Skip if Q1 = 'Not familiar at all, never used it'

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the AI workplace assistant?
questions.routing_logic: Skip if Q1 = 'Not familiar at all, never used it'
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback. Include a large text box for thorough responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text with multi-line input.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the AI workplace assistant?
script.routing_logic: Skip if Q1 = 'Not familiar at all, never used it'

questions.question_text: How has using the AI assistant impacted your daily productivity?
questions.routing_logic: Skip if Q1 = 'Not familiar at all, never used it'
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced scale to measure perceived productivity impact.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons displayed vertically.

script.question_text: How has using the AI assistant impacted your daily productivity?
script.routing_logic: Skip if Q1 = 'Not familiar at all, never used it'
